mapper.insert: insert into material_detail (material_code, material_name, material_type) values (#{material_code}, #{material_name}, #{material_type})
mapper.select: select material_code, material_name from material_detail where material_code = #{material_code}
SELECT * FROM material_detail WHERE material_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{material_code}, '%') AND material_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{material_name}, '%')
